STRINGS: "You really can't continue with this, Houjou.
Any more and you'd be pushing your luck.
Let's cut it short, you did the best you could."
"Please wait just a little longer!!
I am this close!"
"No, there's nothing to be done anymore.
Just look at him.
He can't even tell who you are despite being right in front of him."
"A confession obtained in this state
would be shot down as unadmissable."
As much as I didn't want to admit it, Chief Kuroda's right.
Even if he confesses to a crime now,
he wouldn't be able to be punished through formal procedures.
Since he was Chief Kuroda, I understood his logic in an instant.
However, emotionally speaking, I couldn't accept it.
His head may have a few screws loose, yes,
but I cannot just give up on avenging Mr. Kazamori.
"Aren't you frustrated, Chief Kuroda?"
"Are you kidding me?
I lost one of my precious subordinates, of course I'm frustrated."
"But the hard fact is that we can't draw anything
out of him in these conditions."
He was calm.
That composure brought me back to cruel reality.
I dropped my head in spite of myself.
"Houjou, I understand how much you're hurting.
But now is the time to quit.
Let's leave the holding cells."
Dammit... I expelled a tiny curse.
--Then it happened.
"Did you do it?"
"...Ngah?"
"Answer me now.
I'm asking you if you killed Tamura."
"Uuuhh...oooooooohhhhh...!"
Hiromu Kanaya once again began to hit his forehead on the floor.
Evidence that he had shut off his heart from the outside world.
"Oi, oi. Don't you pretend not to be listening
just because you got asked something inconvenient.
Answer me already, you fat pig."
"...Please don't talk to him without permission."
"A pig like you actually believed it could use the same language
as us humans to flirt with a woman?
Are you insane? Know your place."
"I'm telling you to shut up!!"
"A pig like you really got carried away just because
it got pampered at a high-class club few people can enter?"
"Pay attention, as I'm bothering to teach an animal like yourself.
Those kind of places let anything in as long as they have money.
Be it a man, or a woman, or a fatty, or a pig, or whatever else!!"
"Ooohhh...uuuuuhhhhhnnn...!"
"Please, just stop.
I wasn't able to get anything out of him by hounding him like that,
you saw that, right?"
"I think the way you questioned him was too soft, you see.
Which is why I ask you to let me handle him,
even if you find it embarrassing."
"Time's of the essence, so I have no room to discuss with you. Sorry."
My questioning was too soft...!?
"Haruka Minase, was it?
Hey, Kanaya, is that right?"
"Harukaaa...!"
"Yes, her.
I'm sure you were nothing but trouble to that destitute woman."
"Ooohh~!"
"Pretending to be human and visiting her all the time,
you and your foul stink caused her issue after issue!!"
"Do you remember?
The last expressions the humans you killed made?"
"Did their faces contort in fear of dying?
Do you believe they 'surrendered before your overwhelming strength'?
--Wrong."
"You couldn't be more wrong.
As matter of fact, you misunderstood everything.
Don't be so conceited."
"They couldn't, not in the least, stand the thought of
being killed by swine that lives in unsightly,
disgusting piles of shit like you."
"There, look over your shoulder.
Can't you feel it, the weight of the people you murdered?
Their breath upon your back?"
"Can't you feel one that stands out?
A strong presence. Even I, at a distance, know who it belongs to.
And you, do you recognize it?"
"Uh...uuuuhhh...!"
"...That's right. Hayato Kazamori.
The detective you killed when he tried to arrest you.
That man is right beside you."
"Kazamori is saying something.
He will never give up until you spill your guts.
I'll expose your involvement in the Koutarou Tamura murder, he says."
"I'll make you fess up everything
about the serial murder cases of this town.
Prepare yourself, 'cuz I'll be waiting for you in the depths of hell!"
"HYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHH!!"
"Don't you put the blame on me for everything!!"
--He's actually responding.
His head was in the clouds until now,
yet he came back to reality all at once.
I couldn't help but be astonished at Sekimoto's skill.
"Trying to escape responsibility, huh?
If you keep trying to avoid it so sloppily,
you might come face-to-pale-face with Kazamori tonight."
"I'm telling you those aren't me!!
I only did in that banker called Tamura and my garbage family!"
"Really? What about the other victims?
Who killed Kuromi Watari and the Takenake family?"
"I-i-it's not me. I promise.
It was him. He killed them."
"Who is 'he'?"
"He is, obviously,
o-obviously..."
"Blindman."
It cropped up, its name.
The monster we've been chasing, Blindman.
"Hey, could you give me something to drink?
I can't help it, my throat's dried up."
"Just who is Blindman?"
"Blindman...
I don't know if he even is a he."
"Don't lie.
The sole person in this town who could've known
how Blindman killed was Takenaka."
"But another person is required
to have relayed his knowledge to you.
Ergo, whoever that is must be Blindman."
"In any case, they probably ordered you to keep silent.
However, you'll never see them again.
You may speak to your heart's content."
"Even if I knew, I'd never tell you.
Because if I did, I wouldn't be able to get my medicine."
"You take this medicine as
a dietary supplement or something, right?
Your supplier is Blindman?"
"Yeah, that's right. He is.
Agh, I'm thirsty.
I'm trying my best here."
"How does this medicine help you with your diet?"
"Kukuku... ahahaha, ahah, ahah, ahah.
He's even crazier than I am.
He's stupid in some ways, too, though."
"Answer us. Tell us more about the drug."
"Aha...ahahahahahaha.
It's just like he said it would be.
You're interested in the weight loss drug, aren't you?"
"He had one condition when he gave me the pills.
If someone persistently asked about it, tell them this, he said."
Hiromu Kanaya's hands restlessly squirmed.
Then he curled them into firm fists,
with only the middle fingers sticking out straight.
"Here's Blindman's message to you."
"'There's much more to come'"
"--'Give me your eyes'"
Hiromu Kanaya grinned a fearless smile towards us.
"Agh, dammit... ugh.
I'm so thirsty. I can't endure it any longer..."
"*gulp*, *gulp*, *gulp*, *gulp*, *gulp*... phew...
Aah, nheh... fwihuhu..."
"Kanaya!!!
Chief Kuroda, call an ambulance!!"
He suddenly bit off his own tongue.
Blood streamed from his mouth.
He was mindlessly drinking his own blood.
Every gulp made his expression twist in ecstasy.
But that wasn't enough to fill his stomach,
for he sank his teeth and slowly relished his own tongue.
"*munch*, *munch*, *munch*... *gulp*...
Haah... Hiaahe...!"
There were still things I wanted to hear from his mouth.
Blindman's true identity.
Where they met.
Why copy their M.O.
The relationship between him, Blindman, and Mr. Shinichirou Takenaka.
And once everything had been extracted out of him,
he had to be subjected to punishment in accordance to the law.
At this rate, Hiromu Kanaya is going to avoid
taking responsibility for everything he did.
That is something I must not allow to occur.
At least apologize to Mr. Kazamori--!
"Aha...ahahahahahahahahahahahaha!!!!"
Then, as Hiromu Kanaya drowned in his own overflowing blood,
he flapped his mouth open and close
despite his newfound inability to pronounce consonants.
"Y o u   l o t   c a n   n o   l o n g e r   w i n"
"B l i n d m a n   h a s
a l w a y s   b e e n
w a t c h i n g   y o u"
I couldn't make out anything other than these two sentences.
After that, paramedics rushed over at Chief Kuroda's call
and administered first-aid on him.
However, he had already lost a great deal of blood,
and there was nothing they could do.
